{{codepointer|Classic attack}} {{doomwiki|A_SPosAttack}} '''A_SPosAttack'''
(no parameters)
The attack of Doom's {{Class|ShotgunGuy|Shotgun Guy}}. This shoots three bullets and plays the sound "shotguy/attack".
It is equivalent of: SPOS F 0 bright [[A_PlaySound]]("shotguy/attack", CHAN_WEAPON) SPOS F 10 bright [[A_CustomBulletAttack]](22.5, 0, 3, random(1,5)*3, "{{class|BulletPuff}}", 0, CBAF_NORANDOM)
== Examples == This example is taken straight from Doom's Shotgun Guy.
Missile: SPOS E 10 [[A_FaceTarget]] SPOS F 10 bright '''A_SPosAttack''' SPOS E 10 goto See
